Idol of Terror(#33509) - doesn't contain mitigation/survival part in items comparition (65 agi -> dodge). INTENDED



Most of those are intended because we specifically don't average out procs which drastically change the value of other stats, and they're not used on-cooldown. Instead, we make them available as temporary buffs.
But I can't get how can we compare two idols? According to your current comparition idol of terror is almost the worst choise for bear, it's really confusing.
